title: Easily Enticed
description: Easily Enticed is a mind blowing drama based around a woman named Aubrey, a loyal friend and girlfriend whose trust has been overturned by an obscene plotted scheme motivated by her best friends obsession and jealousy. Trust goes out the window when she realizes that her peers, including her boyfriend of ten years, know the shocking truth behind it all. Trapped in a circle of deceit, jealousy, and vindictiveness Aubrey struggles with finding a way to escape it all. Easily Enticed is a suspenseful drama that will keep you in your sheets until the very end.
author: Shanelle Sara'nita Williams
